snippet: Preserve Marriage Washington, a group opposed to same-sex marriage in Washington State, said the continuing return of late election results on a marriage referendum has shown they have not closed the gap.
abstract: Opponents of same-sex marriage in Washington State concede, saying continuing return of late election results on marriage referendum has shown they have not closed the gap.
lead_paragraph: Preserve Marriage Washington, a group opposed to same-sex marriage in Washington State, said the continuing return of late election results on a marriage referendum has shown they have not closed the gap.

headline.seo: Washington State Gay Marriage Opponents Concede
headline.main: Same-Sex Marriage Rivals Concede in Washington
headline.print_headline: Same-Sex Marriage Rivals Concede in Washington

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
